com.drs.gem.injector.core

Interface Declaration


  • public interface Declaration
    Interface that could be used for modules declaration as alternative way to Container.declareModule().
    Author:
    Diarsid

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Set<ModuleDeclaration> getDeclaredModules()
      Returns set of ModuleDeclaration objects.

    • Method Detail

      • getDeclaredModules

        Set<ModuleDeclaration> getDeclaredModules()
        Returns set of ModuleDeclaration objects. Each object describes one declared module that should be processed by appropriate Container instance.
        Returns:
        set of ModuleDeclaration objects.
        See Also:
        Container, ModuleDeclaration
